args.natural_language_statement: Prove that SL(n) ‚ä≤ GL(n) and GL(n)/SL(n) ‚âÖ ‚Ñù^√ó. Translate into Lean4 using Mathlib and end each statement with := by sorry. Use matrices over the reals, treat GL(n) as the units of Matrix n n ‚Ñù and SL(n) as the kernel of determinant homomorphism, and state the normality and the isomorphism of quotient with ‚ÑùÀ£.

{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Lean Meta

open Lean.Parser.Tactic

/-- I want to generate a proof for the statement: "if \( a \) is less than \( b \) and \( b \) is less than \( c \), then \( a \) is less than \( c \)". Can you provide me with the code to accomplish this? -/
def ltTran [LinearOrder Œ±] {a b c : Œ±} : a < b ‚Üí b < c ‚Üí a < c := sorry"}

args.query: Mathlib4 GeneralLinearGroup Matrix GL SL determinant subgroup Maths Lean4 GeneralLinearGroup mathlib4

args.content:
import Mathlib

variable {n : Type _} [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n]

/-- General linear group as units of n-by-n real matrices. -/
def GL := Units (Matrix n n ‚Ñù)

/-- Special linear subgroup as those units with determinant 1. -/
def SL_set (g : GL) : Prop := Matrix.det (g : Matrix n n ‚Ñù) = 1

/-- SL(n) is normal in GL(n): conjugation preserves determinant 1. -/
theorem SL_is_normal : ‚àÄ g A : GL, SL_set A ‚Üí SL_set (g * A * g‚Åª¬π) := by sorry

/-- The determinant induces a surjective homomorphism GL(n) ‚Üí ‚ÑùÀ£ with kernel SL(n),
    so GL(n)/SL(n) ‚âÉ ‚ÑùÀ£ (first isomorphism theorem formulation). -/
theorem GL_mod_SL_is_Runits : ‚àÉ (œÜ : GL ‚Üí* Units ‚Ñù), Function.Surjective œÜ ‚àß ‚àÄ A, (œÜ A = 1) ‚Üî Matrix.det (A : Matrix n n ‚Ñù) = 1 := by sorry

import Mathlib

variable {n : Type _} [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n]

/-- General linear group as units of n-by-n real matrices. -/
def GL : Type _ := Units (Matrix n n ‚Ñù)

/-- Special linear subgroup as those units with determinant 1. -/
def SL (g : GL) : Prop := Matrix.det g.1 = 1

/-- SL(n) is normal in GL(n): conjugation preserves determinant 1. -/
theorem SL_normal : ‚àÄ g A : GL, SL A ‚Üí SL (g * A * g‚Åª¬π) := by sorry

/-- The determinant induces a surjective homomorphism GL(n) ‚Üí ‚ÑùÀ£ with kernel SL(n),
    so GL(n)/SL(n) ‚âÉ ‚ÑùÀ£ (existence of the hom and kernel property stated). -/
theorem GL_mod_SL_equiv_R_units : ‚àÉ (œÜ : GL ‚Üí* Units ‚Ñù), Function.Surjective (œÜ : GL ‚Üí Units ‚Ñù) ‚àß ‚àÄ A, (œÜ A = 1) ‚Üî Matrix.det A.1 = 1 := by sorry

import Mathlib

variable {n : Type _} [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n]

/-- General linear group as units of n-by-n real matrices. -/
def GL : Type _ := Units (Matrix n n ‚Ñù)

/-- Special linear subgroup as those units with determinant 1. -/
def SL (g : GL) : Prop := Matrix.det (g : Matrix n n ‚Ñù) = 1

/-- SL(n) is normal in GL(n): conjugation preserves determinant 1. -/
theorem SL_normal : ‚àÄ g A : GL, SL A ‚Üí SL (g * A * g‚Åª¬π) := by
  intros g A h
  -- det (g * A * g‚Åª¬π) = det g * det A * det g‚Åª¬π = det A
  sorry

/-- The determinant induces a surjective homomorphism GL(n) ‚Üí ‚ÑùÀ£ with kernel SL(n),
    so GL(n)/SL(n) ‚âÉ ‚ÑùÀ£ (existence of the hom and kernel property stated). -/
theorem GL_mod_SL_equiv_R_units : ‚àÉ (œÜ : GL ‚Üí* Units ‚Ñù),
  Function.Surjective (œÜ : GL ‚Üí Units ‚Ñù) ‚àß ‚àÄ A, œÜ A = 1 ‚Üî Matrix.det (A : Matrix n n ‚Ñù) = 1 := by
  -- one can take œÜ = MulEquiv.map (det) as a monoid hom into Units ‚Ñù; omit proof
  sorry

import Mathlib

variable {n : Type _} [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n]

/-- General linear group as units of n-by-n real matrices. -/
def GL : Type _ := Units (Matrix n n ‚Ñù)

/-- Special linear subgroup as those units with determinant 1. -/
def SL (g : GL) : Prop := Matrix.det g.val = 1

/-- SL(n) is normal in GL(n): conjugation preserves determinant 1. -/
theorem SL_normal : ‚àÄ g A : GL, SL A ‚Üí SL (g * A * g‚Åª¬π) := by
  intros g A h
  -- det (g * A * g‚Åª¬π) = det g * det A * det g‚Åª¬π = det A
  sorry

/-- The determinant induces a surjective homomorphism GL(n) ‚Üí ‚ÑùÀ£ with kernel SL(n),
    so GL(n)/SL(n) ‚âÉ ‚ÑùÀ£ (existence of the hom and kernel property stated). -/
theorem GL_mod_SL_equiv_R_units : ‚àÉ (œÜ : GL ‚Üí Units ‚Ñù),
  Function.Surjective œÜ ‚àß ‚àÄ A, œÜ A = 1 ‚Üî Matrix.det A.val = 1 := by
  -- one can take œÜ = Units.map (fun M => Matrix.det M) restricted; omit proof
  sorry

import Mathlib

variable {n : Type _} [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n]

/-- General linear group as units of n-by-n real matrices. -/
def GL : Type _ := Units (Matrix n n ‚Ñù)

/-- Special linear subgroup as those units with determinant 1. -/
def SL (g : GL) : Prop := Matrix.det (g : Matrix n n ‚Ñù) = 1

/-- SL(n) is normal in GL(n): conjugation preserves determinant 1. -/
theorem SL_normal (g A : GL) (h : SL A) : SL (g * A * g‚Åª¬π) := by
  -- det (g * A * g‚Åª¬π) = det g * det A * det g‚Åª¬π = det A
  sorry

/-- The determinant induces a surjective homomorphism GL(n) ‚Üí ‚ÑùÀ£ with kernel SL(n),
    so GL(n)/SL(n) ‚âÉ ‚ÑùÀ£ (existence of the hom and kernel property stated). -/
theorem GL_mod_SL_equiv_R_units : ‚àÉ (œÜ : GL ‚Üí* Units ‚Ñù),
  Function.Surjective (œÜ : GL ‚Üí Units ‚Ñù) ‚àß ‚àÄ A, œÜ A = 1 ‚Üî Matrix.det (A : Matrix n n ‚Ñù) = 1 := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

variable (n : Nat)

/-- General linear group as the units of n√ón real matrices. -/
def GL : Type _ := Units (Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù)

/-- Special linear subgroup: determinant equals 1. -/
def SL (g : GL n) : Prop := Matrix.det (g : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù) = 1

/-- SL(n) is normal in GL(n): conjugation preserves determinant 1. -/
theorem SL_normal (g A : GL n) (h : SL n A) : SL n (g * A * g‚Åª¬π) := by
  -- det (g * A * g‚Åª¬π) = det g * det A * det g‚Åª¬π = det A
  sorry

/-- The determinant induces a surjective homomorphism GL(n) ‚Üí ‚ÑùÀ£ with kernel SL(n).
    Statement of existence; proof omitted. -/
theorem GL_mod_SL_equiv_R_units : ‚àÉ (œÜ : GL n ‚Üí* Units ‚Ñù),
  Function.Surjective (œÜ : GL n ‚Üí Units ‚Ñù) ‚àß ‚àÄ A, œÜ A = 1 ‚Üî Matrix.det (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù) = 1 := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

variable (n : Nat)

/-- General linear group as the units of n√ón real matrices. -/
def GL : Type _ := Units (Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù)

/-- Special linear subgroup: determinant equals 1. -/
def SL (g : GL n) : Prop := Matrix.det g.val = 1

/-- SL(n) is normal in GL(n): conjugation preserves determinant 1. -/
theorem SL_normal (g A : GL n) (h : SL n A) : SL n (g * A * g‚Åª¬π) := by sorry

/-- The determinant induces a surjective homomorphism GL(n) ‚Üí ‚ÑùÀ£ with kernel SL(n).
    Statement of existence; proof omitted. -/
theorem GL_mod_SL_equiv_R_units : ‚àÉ (œÜ : GL n ‚Üí* Units ‚Ñù),
  Function.Surjective (œÜ : GL n ‚Üí Units ‚Ñù) ‚àß ‚àÄ A, œÜ A = 1 ‚Üî Matrix.det A.val = 1 := by sorry

import Mathlib

variable (n : Nat)

/-- General linear group as the units of n√ón real matrices. -/
def GL : Type _ := Units (Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù)

/-- Special linear subgroup: determinant equals 1. -/
def SL (g : GL n) : Prop := Matrix.det g.val = 1

/-- SL(n) is normal in GL(n): conjugation preserves determinant 1. -/
theorem SL_normal (g A : GL n) (h : SL n A) : SL n (g * A * g‚Åª¬π) := by
  -- determinant is multiplicative, and det g * det g‚Åª¬π = 1
  have : Matrix.det (g * A * g‚Åª¬π : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù) = Matrix.det g.val * Matrix.det A.val * Matrix.det (g‚Åª¬π).val := by sorry
  sorry

/-- The determinant induces a surjective homomorphism GL(n) ‚Üí ‚ÑùÀ£ with kernel SL(n).
    Statement of existence; proof omitted. -/
theorem GL_mod_SL_equiv_R_units : ‚àÉ (œÜ : GL n ‚Üí* Units ‚Ñù),
  Function.Surjective (œÜ : GL n ‚Üí Units ‚Ñù) ‚àß ‚àÄ A, œÜ A = 1 ‚Üî Matrix.det A.val = 1 := by
  sorry
